title: Butternut squash soup with Gorgonzola and bacon
ingredients: ['250g butternut squash, peeled and diced', '500g potatoes', '500ml vegetable stock', '4 or 5 sage leaves', '100g bacon, diced', '50g Gorgonzola or other blue cheese', '4 slices toast', 'extra virgin olive oil, to taste', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
